title: Any T206 blank backs or Piedmont 350-460 Fact. 42. Up for sale?
author: wazoo

posts.post_title: Any T206 blank backs or Piedmont 350-460 Fact. 42. Up for sale?
posts.post_content: I am looking for a T206 with a blank back, a T206 with a brown Hindu back, a T206 printer scrap, and a T206 with a Piedmont 350-460 Factory 42. Please let me know if you have any, and are willing to sell or trade. Thank you.

Wazoo!!

The BB is going to cost alot of coin and the scrap, but they are THE MOST beautiful cards i think!! I collect piedy 42....giving u a heads up , there is a Konetchy with a back stamp on ebay right  now with a start bid of $150.00 which is very reasonable for 42!!(if u dont mind the stamp)....check it out;)

You picked a great set to collect!!GOOD LUCK:D

Thank you! I've understood that blank backs would cost a lot, just wanted to see how much they ran. I've been in many bidding wars for that Piedmont Factory 42, yet still no luck. I just checked out the card, and it is a beauty and reasonably priced, but I can't have the stamp. Eventually I run across one that no one has picked up yet.

Good luck on the venture!!!
I love blank backs becuase they are scrap also, wait till u get one/if......they are sweeeeeeeeeeeeeeeet!!:)

Piedy 42 are a HUGELY underrated back.......I love em Also....

KEEP US POSTED....


:D
